discussion.p: After , variant becomes completely constexpr-able, which means that common_iterator can also be completely constexpr-able.
Set priority to 3 after reflector poll.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4892.

li.p: Modify , class template common_iterator synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.pre: template<class I2, class S2> requires convertible_to<const I2&, I> && convertible_to<const S2&, S> && assignable_from<I&, const I2&> && assignable_from<S&, const S2&> constexpr common_iterator& operator=(const common_iterator<I2, S2>& x);
constexpr decltype(auto) operator->() const requires see below;

blockquote.p:
-3- The expression in the requires-clause is equivalent to:
[…]

blockquote.pre: template<class I2, sentinel_for<I> S2> requires sentinel_for<S, I2> friend constexpr bool operator==( const common_iterator& x, const common_iterator<I2, S2>& y);
template<class I2, sentinel_for<I> S2> requires sentinel_for<S, I2> && equality_comparable_with<I, I2> friend constexpr bool operator==( const common_iterator& x, const common_iterator<I2, S2>& y);

template<sized_sentinel_for<I> I2, sized_sentinel_for<I> S2> requires sized_sentinel_for<S, I2> friend constexpr iter_difference_t<I2> operator-( const common_iterator& x, const common_iterator<I2, S2>& y);
